Darkfate::

Darkfate received the menssage, he opened his comm link and 
said "Here's Darkfate... Someone are sent to your coordinates..."

he typed some thing else and seconds later Shivah left the 
BlackFortress.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     His small sub-light ship left the planet he had destroyed on a 
journey to 
> find a new home.  His mind was torn with visions of the Buggers he 
had just 
> annihilated.  He flew onward for many weeks as millennia passed in 
real time. 
>  His personal transport which had been equipped with one bomb 
capable of 
> destroying a world.  He had used that already and was now unarmed.
> 
>     By some bizarre quirk of fate his transport stumbled into a 
hole in the 
> fabric of space and time.  He was flung out millions of years 
before he had 
> destroyed the bugger homeworld.  He was flung out millions of miles 
from 
> where he had last been.  He was flung out spinning toward Earth.
> 
>     He was able to gain enough control to not crash so hard as to 
die on 
> impact but he did happen to land on Enertron who died.  Before he 
stepped out 
> he realized that he would need an alternate form for this strange 
world.  For 
> a touch of irony he chose the form of the bugger drones he had just 
> annihilated millions of years in the future.
> 
>     He stepped out and looked around.  He was on an open field 
surrounded by, 
> well, field.  This would not do to hide his ship.  He got back in 
and found a 
> cave in the Appalachian Mountains half way around the world.  He 
seals the 
> cave with a few shots burying the only opening.  He was careful to 
leave no 
> new openings in it's wake.  It would appear to any passerby that it 
was 
> simply a recent rockslide.
> 
>     He knew that there were at least some other bots here from his 
brief and 
> violent trip through the atmosphere.  Ender transmits a brief 
message on all 
> channels.  "This is Ender I wish to find someone else here."
